DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate ability NICOM ( Noninvasive cardiac output monitor ) detect stroke volume variation induce leg raise fluid expansion surgery
DOC.brief_title: Validation Nicom Device Measure Stoke Volume Variation
DOC.criteria: patient undergo general anesthesia expect duration exceed two hour gastrointestinal surgery , urological gynecological surgery . Difficulty venous access . Contraindication use oesophageal Doppler Contraindication use Nicom Contraindication use bispectral index Pregnant lactating woman
